name: Evil
description:
Evil - First-person horror.
In this game you will play for a girl who was left alone to spend the night at home. She can not sleep - it seems to her that her who's watching. After a while Ksenia notice someone or something passed by her room.

In the game you will need to be careful - the danger can appear from nowhere.
Your actions affect the ending of the game.Features:
  • Trading cards
  • 2 versions of the ending of the game
  • Good graphics
  • A good story
  • Puzzles
